title: Instructional Design Based on Predictive Models for Enhancing e-Learning Platform Usability

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional methodologies and digital education tools
context.additional_context: Training course where pre-service teachers analyze models predicting learner satisfaction when using e-learning platforms in science subjects and design effective teaching methods based on findings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze usability elements (learnability, efficiency, effectiveness, content design) of e-learning platforms and construct a satisfaction prediction model.
Learners can establish instructional strategies reflecting predictive model results when designing digital science curriculum content.
Learners can design a formative assessment system for self-directed e-learning platforms in small-classroom environments.

resources: Sample e-learning content for science curriculum

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
